name: Backrooms 2D (JujuProdGames)
description:
-VIDEO- -Description-

The Backrooms is an internet creepypasta unsettling millions of viewers around the world, where you noclip out of reality into a liminal space with nothing but millions of miles of rooms. Since many Backrooms games already exist, I decided to take a spin with making the game 2D instead of the usual 3D.

Inspired by Kane Pixel's Backrooms series. ❤️
